overview: Abortion Bin Productions second feature film in which a man loses his mind, literally!! What would you do if one morning you woke up to find a "dear john" letter from your brain? Go search for it of course! Filled with black humor, visual mind fucks and a nice touch of gore. This could be the CULT movie you've been waiting for.
tagline: A Story of Life, Love and Insanity
title: Synchronicity
